page.title: 12INTERVIEW
page.content: There have been many changes in the town over the last twenty years.The Housing Executive have built many new housing estates and this has resulted in a rapid growth of population.Many country people have moved into the town. There is a new Leisure Centre being built and this will be a great asset to the young people.It is a pity there is no swimming pool in it . There used to be two hotels in the area;one was destroyed in a fire and the other was blown up.Sean McHugh is building a new hotel.
